name: EliteClient
description: A highly customisable, open source client for Discord bots written in Java.

TOKEN.description: The token of your Discord Bot

PREFIX.description: The prefix you want to use with the bot.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Discord user ID, needed for some commands...

APP_ID.description: The application ID of the bot, needed in the future.

HEROKU.description: LEAVE IT AS 'yes' OR THINGS WILL BREAK.
